entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskesiu Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
